hero.title: The Dart Backend Framework
hero.subtitle: Build high-performance APIs and command-line tools with the elegance of Dart
hero.description: Khadem is a modern, modular backend framework inspired by Laravel and AdonisJS, designed for developers who want clean architecture and lightning-fast performance.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: JIT compilation and optimized architecture deliver exceptional performance for your applications.

modular.title: Modular Architecture
modular.description: Clean separation of concerns with a powerful service container and dependency injection system.

cli.title: Developer-Friendly CLI
cli.description: Intuitive command-line tools for project scaffolding, migrations, and deployment automation.

docker.title: Docker Ready
docker.description: Built-in Docker support with optimized containers for seamless deployment and scaling.

codeExample.title: Get Started in Minutes
codeExample.description: Create a new Khadem project and start building immediately with our intuitive CLI.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Developers
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of developers building the future with Khadem

footer.description: The modern Dart backend framework for building scalable applications.
